p: It is against this backdrop that Q-methodology was identified as an adequate research design when investigating themes such as Afro-polychronism (more specifically TO and SSC), climate change awareness and climate change causality. This research method is also useful in the investigation of cultural beliefs and its influences on risk perception and consequently climate change adaptation, as investigating subjectivity and its components can provide insight into human behaviour (Paige 2014; van Excel & de Graaf 2005).
